metadata.synopsis: A coming-of-age comedy follows the life of Jimmy Livingston (Jake Gyllenhaal), a young man born without immunities and raised in a manufactured world provided by his well-intentioned, but misguided mother (Swoosie Kurtz). But when he realizes that he's in love with Chloe (Marley Shelton), the girl next door, he has no choice but to build a mobile bubble suit, and set off across the country to Niagara Falls, to stop Chloe's wedding -- which is only seven days away -- in time to confess his love.

reviews: Sweet, charming, surprising, inspirational and funny. Bubble Boy is pure Disney gold.
A fun and oddly entertaining twist on the road trip film.
The film is only sporadically funny, and it's frequently in poor taste, but it's got energy to spare, and Gyllenhaal's performance gives it a soul.
Bubble Boy is a strange, bizarre, twisted romantic comedy.
...the most anti-human movie to surface since Showgirls.
O personagem-ttulo no  apenas sem graa, mas tambm chato.
(Bubble Boy) squanders its strongest moments but at least has the courage to attempt strong moments.
Hayes shows a deft touch with both cartoony slapstick and character-based comedy and manages to create moments of real poignancy in between.
Despite what his mother taught him, despite the evil and injustice he encounters in the world, little Jimmy Livingston is kind and understanding and tolerant of others. That's the moral.
